name: Blobs (jarommadsen)
description:
Use arrow keys or WADS to move. Avoid bigger blobs. Eat the smaller ones. Press space to restart.

Didn't get the memo? I'm making a game every day for 10 days! The first submission in the challenge is BLOBS! You start as a tiny blob that's been pushed around all his microscopic life. Well no more! He decides to take over! Eat those that are smaller and weaker than you are to become bigger until you can eat even the most ginormous blob of them all! Reach 100% boss level to win.

Music: Exploring - by Jarom Madsen
